appDefinition.Metadata: <CustomApplication xmlns="http://soap.sforce.com/2006/04/metadata" > <brand> <headerColor>#0070D2</headerColor> <logo>sked__knStjhBI</logo> <logoVersion>1</logoVersion> <shouldOverrideOrgTheme>false</shouldOverrideOrgTheme> </brand> <description>Skedulo is a modern web and mobile application for scheduling, managing, and optimizing a mobile workforce.</description> <formFactors>Large</formFactors> <isNavAutoTempTabsDisabled>false</isNavAutoTempTabsDisabled> <isNavPersonalizationDisabled>false</isNavPersonalizationDisabled> <isServiceCloudConsole>false</isServiceCloudConsole> <label>Skedulo</label> <navType>Standard</navType> <profileActionOverrides> <actionName>Tab</actionName> <content>ARC_Service_Console_Home_Page_Team_Leads</content> <formFactor>Large</formFactor> <pageOrSobjectType>standard-home</pageOrSobjectType> <type>Flexipage</type> <profile>Admin</profile> </profileActionOverrides> <tabs>standard-home</tabs> <tabs>sked__Job__c</tabs> <tabs>sked__Resource__c</tabs> <tabs>sked__Region__c</tabs> <tabs>sked__Location__c</tabs> <tabs>sked__Tag__c</tabs> <tabs>sked__Job_Allocation__c</tabs> <tabs>sked__Holiday__c</tabs> <tabs>sked__Recurring_Schedule__c</tabs> <tabs>sked__Activity__c</tabs> <tabs>sked__Shift__c</tabs> <uiType>Lightning</uiType> <utilityBar>sked__Skedulo_UtilityBar</utilityBar> </CustomApplication>
